sentences.english: The cat jumps from the shelf to the armchair.
It jumps from the armchair to the rug.
It jumps from the rug to the chair.
It jumps from the chair to the coffee table.
It jumps from the coffee table to the dining table.
It jumps from the dining table to the sofa.
It jumps from the sofa to the bed.
It jumps from the bed to the shelf.
